content.raw: AtlasSimInterface 2.10.2 will be distributed by Boston Dynamics, unlike previous versions.  We are actively working on the new distribution which will reflect the changes to the arms and the new “unplugged” battery pack system.  Boston Dynamics will be contacting team members shortly to explain how to get the new software.  We expect the software to be ready within the next 4 weeks.
content.html: AtlasSimInterface 2.10.2 will be distributed by Boston Dynamics, unlike previous versions. We are actively working on the new distribution which will reflect the changes to the arms and the new “unplugged” battery pack system. Boston Dynamics will be contacting team members shortly to explain how to get the new software. We expect the software to be ready within the next 4 weeks.
